name: Expenses ARTICLE 11.  MISCELLANEOUS
text: Expenses.  If a derivative action is successful, in whole or in part, or if anything is received by the plaintiff as a result of a judgment, compromise, or settlement of an action or claim, the court may award the plaintiff reasonable expenses, including reasonable attorney's fees, and shall direct the plaintiff to remit to the limited partnership the remainder of those proceeds received by the plaintiff. [L 1989, c 288, pt of §1]
